name: Julia (VSCode)
description: You can help improve the Julia VS Code extension by sending usage statistics and exceptions to the development team. By default, telemetry and crash report data are not collected, but rather the user has to opt-in to have their data sent.

telemetry.name: Usage data
telemetry.description: Anonymous, non-identifying usage and error data is sent to the development team.

telemetry.name: Crash data
telemetry.description: Stack traces from errors in the extension are sent to the development team. Those stack traces can contain identifying information, for example filenames.
